member.name: M:backend.financesApi.Controllers.BudgetController.GetBudgetsAsync

Returns NoContent when the list of budgets is empty

member.name: M:backend.financesApi.Controllers.BudgetController.AddBudgetAsync(backend.financesApi.DTOs.AddBudgetDTO)
member.param:
Data for the budget to be created
Parameter 'category' must be one of these:
'entertainment', 'transportation', 'housing', 'food', 'education', 'shopping', 'other'
member.response: Returns Created when the budget is created successfully
Returns BadRequest when the provided data is invalid
Returns NotFound When a validation error occurs
Returns Unauthorized when 'Authorization' header is not included or the value is wrong
